item.title: Residents Allowing Dogs in Communal Areas Despite Rules, 29th November
item.description:
Residents are still letting their dogs pee in the front and back communal areas of Athelstan House, despite signs and previous letters from Housing Officer Shaun Walker. Dogs arenâ€™t allowed here, but the problem continues. Please reinforce the rule.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Londesborough Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Raised sharp pavement slab, 29th November
item.description:

item.description:
Message for Bexley Council Subject: Abandoned Vehicle on Totnes Road â€“ Urgent Removal Request Hello, I would like to report an abandoned vehicle on Totnes Road, Welling. Vehicle details: â€¢ Registration: LY23 XMH â€¢ Colour/Make/Model: Unknown â€¢ Exact location: Parked outside 29 Totnes Road The vehicle has been there since the end of September and shows clear signs of abandonment and vandalism, including: â€¢ Windscreen smashed â€¢ Windows left open â€¢ All tyres flat â€¢ Exterior damage â€¢ DVLA check confirms the vehicle is not registered The vehicle is unsafe, unsightly, and attracting antisocial behaviour, so I am requesting urgent investigation and removal. Thank you,
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Totnes Road, East Wickham, Greater London

item.title: Old fridge, 29th November
item.description:

item.title: Youngster dropping excessive flyers, 29th November
item.description:
